ul.li: &appName; User Manual (a PDF version is available)

isb:document.p: &appName; is a chemical kinetics stochastic simulation software package written in Java. It provides a model definition environment and an implementation of the Gillespie and Gibson-Bruck stochastic algorithms. &appName; is capable of importing and exporting the SBML model definition language, as well as displaying models graphically using the Cytoscape software system. The &appName; system is based on the &localJavaLibraryName; library. The software is available for download within a self-extracting installer (see the "Download &appName;" link above), subject to the terms of the software license agreement. The license agreement is the GNU Lesser General Public License (LGPL), which is a standard "free software" and "open source" license. &appName; requires the Java 2 Runtime Environment (JRE) version 1.4 or newer, or an equivalent JRE. For more information about the &appName; system, please consult the &appName; User Manual.
